name: Endless Night - Alpha
description: Endless Night is a room-scale VR experience that will get your heart pumping and your adrenaline roaring.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core-i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core-i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
